name: Audi Design System set up with story.to.design
description:
The luxury car manufacturer Audi has its own design system showcased on the Storybook website.


This Figma library was generated directly from Audi's Storybook code using the story.to.design plugin.


A walk-through of setting up this library was done on Learn With Jason, make sure to check it out!


ðŸŽ¯ What's inside:

  • A page documenting all components with links to their Storybook page
  • 21 Figma components with their variants


This is a complete Figma UI kit with hundreds of variants that was created in just minutes. With story.to.design designers can focus on creating new designs, not maintaining UI kits.
